name: Arizona Cheesy Chimichanga Dip
author: McCormick Spice
summary: Serve up authentic Tex-Mex flavor with our dip of the hat to the famous chimichanga! Start with a creamy base of cream cheese, sour cream and a twist on traditional mayo – tangy McCormick® Mayonesa with Lime. Add shredded chicken, Mexican cheese, Burrito Seasoning Mix and chilies for south of the border taste. Spoon into tostada bowls, bake and top off with cheese and chopped cilantro. Muy Bueno!
ingredients: ½ cup McCormick® Mayonnaise with Lime Juice (Mayonesa) or mayonnaise
1 (4 ounce) can diced green chilies, undrained
½ cup shredded Mexican cheese blend, divided
directions: Mix cream cheese, mayonnaise, sour cream, chiles, Seasoning Mix and 1/4 cup of the shredded cheese in large bowl until well blended
Place tostada bowls on foil-lined baking sheet
Spoon dip evenly into the 2 tostada bowls
Top each bowl with remaining 1/4 cup shredded cheese
Bake 25 minutes or until heated through
Serve with desired toppings and tortilla chips
